CustomField.description: Defines the last date/time the Beacon was run. Inspire Planner Beacon performs the following system processes: sync Salesforce Tasks to Project Tasks, roll-up calculations for effort and cost, unlocks Projects, deletes unassigned Salesforce Tasks.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the last date/time the Beacon was run. Inspire Planner Beacon performs the following system processes: sync Salesforce Tasks to Project Tasks, roll-up calculations for effort and cost, unlocks Projects, deletes unassigned Salesforce Tasks.
CustomField.label: Beacon Last Executed
